card.name: Abyssal Nightstalker
card.ability: Whenever Abyssal Nightstalker attacks and isn't blocked, defending player discards a card.
card.ruling: 4/15/2013 : An ability that triggers when something "attacks and isn't blocked" triggers in the declare blockers step after blockers are declared if (1) that creature is attacking and (2) no creatures are declared to block it. It will trigger even if that creature was put onto the battlefield attacking rather than having been declared as an attacker in the declare attackers step.

card.name: Air Elemental
card.ability: Flying
card.flavor: As insubstantial, and as powerful, as the wind that carries it.

card.name: Alaborn Cavalier
card.ability: Whenever Alaborn Cavalier attacks, you may tap target creature.
card.flavor:
"Course he ran I wouldn't want to stare down that barrel, either"
—Alaborn soldier

card.name: Alaborn Grenadier
card.ability: Vigilance
card.flavor:
"Ever proud, ever vigilant."
—Grenadier motto

card.name: Alaborn Musketeer
card.ability: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
card.flavor: Muskets gave the Alaborn army an advantage it had long lacked—air defense.

card.name: Alaborn Trooper
card.flavor:
"I dedicate my body to my country
And my life to my King."
—Alaborn Soldier's Oath

card.name: Alaborn Veteran
card.ability: {T}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

card.name: Alaborn Zealot
card.ability: When Alaborn Zealot blocks a creature, destroy that creature and Alaborn Zealot.

card.name: Alluring Scent
card.ability: All creatures able to block target creature this turn do so.
card.flavor: No earthly armor is protection against this sweetness.

card.name: Ancient Craving
card.ability: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.
card.flavor:
"Knowledge demands sacrifice."
—Tojira, swamp queen

card.name: Angel of Fury
card.ability:
Flying
When Angel of Fury is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may shuffle it into your library.
card.ruling:
10/1/2008 : If Angel of Fury is removed from the graveyard after the ability triggers but before it resolves, it won't get shuffled into its owner's library. Similarly, if a replacement effect has the Incarnation move to a different zone instead of being put into the graveyard, the ability won't trigger at all.
10/1/2008 : Angel of Fury's second ability is a leaves-the-battlefield ability. Because it works only from on the battlefield, it behaves differently than the _Lorwyn_ Incarnations. When Angel of Fury is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, it will look back in time (to the point just before it left the battlefield) to see if its ability triggers. That means the following: -- If Angel of Fury lost its triggered ability while on the battlefield (due to Snakeform, for example) and then was destroyed, the ability would not trigger. Angel of Fury would stay in its owner's graveyard. -- If Angel of Fury had its triggered ability when it left the battlefield, but lost it when it was put into the graveyard (due to Yixlid Jailer, for example), the ability would still trigger. Angel of Fury would be shuffled into its owner's library.

card.name: Angel of Mercy
card.ability:
Flying
When Angel of Mercy enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Angelic Blessing
card.ability: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
card.flavor: The man who rose up to fight was not the same man knocked down.

card.name: Angelic Wall
card.ability: Defender, flying
card.flavor: Be at peace, and observe its beauty. Be at war, and feel its justice.

card.name: Apprentice Sorcerer
card.ability: {T}: Apprentice Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

card.name: Archangel
card.ability: Flying, vigilance

card.name: Armageddon
card.ability: Destroy all lands.
card.flavor: War destroys more than just the land. War destroys hope.

card.name: Armored Galleon
card.ability: Armored Galleon can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
card.flavor:
"Information equals profits. Our merchants sell it, or our pirates use it."
—Jefan, Talas ship captain

card.name: Armored Griffin
card.ability: Flying, vigilance

card.name: Barbtooth Wurm
card.flavor: In its lair lies a carpet of bones.

card.name: Bargain
card.ability:
Target opponent draws a card.
You gain 7 life.
card.flavor: Bargaining with a goblin is like trading with a child; both believe they already own everything.

card.name: Bear Cub
card.flavor:
Every little cub has its mother's teeth to guard it.
—Elvish saying

card.name: Bee Sting
card.ability: Bee Sting deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
card.flavor:
Busy as a bumblebee, blistered as a goblin.
—Alaborn saying

card.name: Blaze
card.ability: Blaze deals X damage to target creature or player.
card.flavor:
"This isn't what I meant by ‘facing the heat of battle'"
—Jefan, Talas ship captain

card.name: Bloodcurdling Scream
card.ability: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.
card.flavor:
"I have all the weapons my enemies have—and far deeper rage."
—Tojira, swamp queen

card.name: Breath of Life
card.ability: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Brimstone Dragon
card.ability: Flying, haste

card.name: Brutal Nightstalker
card.ability: When Brutal Nightstalker enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent discard a card.

card.name: Chorus of Woe
card.ability: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
card.flavor: When nightstalkers sing, nothing in creation sleeps.

card.name: Coastal Wizard
card.ability: {T}: Return Coastal Wizard and another target creature to their owners' hands. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

card.name: Coercion
card.ability: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.
card.flavor:
"Human tenderness is simply weakness in a pretty package."
—Tojira, swamp queen

card.name: Cruel Edict
card.ability: Target opponent sacrifices a creature.
card.flavor:
"Such a fragile organ, the brain."
—Tojira, swamp queen

card.name: Cunning Giant
card.ability: If Cunning Giant is unblocked, you may have it assign its combat damage to a creature defending player controls.

card.name: Dakmor Bat
card.ability: Flying
card.flavor: The bat thrives on what underestimates it.

card.name: Dakmor Plague
card.ability: Dakmor Plague deals 3 damage to each creature and each player.
card.flavor: The tiniest cough can be deadlier than the fiercest dragon.

card.name: Dakmor Scorpion
card.flavor: A scorpion this big you won't find curled up in your boot. Maybe around your boot, but not in it.

card.name: Dakmor Sorceress
card.ability: Dakmor Sorceress's power is equal to the number of Swamps you control.

card.name: Dark Offering
card.ability: Destroy target nonblack creature. You gain 3 life.
card.flavor:
"Our greatest hope has become our enemy's greatest triumph."
—Restela, Alaborn marshal

card.name: Deathcoil Wurm
card.ability: You may have Deathcoil Wurm assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.
card.ruling:
4/1/2008 : If this creature is attacking a planeswalker, assigning its damage as though it weren't blocked means the damage is assigned to the planeswalker, not to the defending player.
4/1/2008 : When assigning combat damage, you choose whether you want to assign all damage to blocking creatures, or if you want to assign all of it to the defending player or planeswalker. You can't split the damage assignment between them.
4/1/2008 : You can decide to assign damage to the defending player or planeswalker even if the blocking creature has protection from green or damage preventing effects on it.
4/1/2008 : If blocked by a creature with banding, the defending player decides whether or not the damage is assigned "as though it weren't blocked".

card.name: Deep Wood
card.ability:
Cast Deep Wood only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by attacking creatures.

card.name: Déjà Vu
card.ability: Return target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
card.flavor: History is the study of repetition.

card.name: Denizen of the Deep
card.ability: When Denizen of the Deep enters the battlefield, return each other creature you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Earthquake
card.ability: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : Whether or not a creature is without flying is only checked on resolution.

card.name: Exhaustion
card.ability: Creatures and lands target opponent controls don't untap during his or her next untap step.
card.ruling:
10/4/2004 : The creatures and lands are only prevented from untapping during the targeted player's next untap step. They can still can untap during other player's untap steps.
10/1/2009 : No creatures or lands controlled by the player will untap during his or her next untap step. This includes those which entered the battlefield after Exhaustion resolved.

card.name: Extinguish
card.ability: Counter target sorcery spell.

card.name: Eye Spy
card.ability: Look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card into his or her graveyard.

card.name: False Summoning
card.ability: Counter target creature spell.

card.name: Festival of Trokin
card.ability: You gain 2 life for each creature you control.
card.flavor: Everyone loves a good sale.

card.name: Foul Spirit
card.ability:
Flying
When Foul Spirit enters the battlefield, sacrifice a land.

card.name: Goblin Cavaliers
card.flavor: They get along so well with their goats because they're practically goats themselves.

card.name: Goblin Firestarter
card.ability: Sacrifice Goblin Firestarter: Goblin Firestarter deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

card.name: Goblin General
card.ability: Whenever Goblin General attacks, Goblin creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
card.flavor: Lead, follow, or run around like crazy.

card.name: Goblin Glider
card.ability:
Flying
Goblin Glider can't block.
card.flavor: The goblins call the gliders "death from above." Everyone else calls them "clods in the clouds."

card.name: Goblin Lore
card.ability: Draw four cards, then discard three cards at random.
card.flavor:
"I done forgot more than you'll ever know, pipsqueak."
"Yeah—that's your problem."

card.name: Goblin Matron
card.ability: When Goblin Matron enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Goblin card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
card.ruling:
10/4/2004 : Because the "search" requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don't have to find the card if you don't want to.
4/1/2008 : You can search for any card with the creature type Goblin, including Creature or Tribal cards. Older cards of type "Summon Goblin" and "Summon Goblins" also count. You can't search for cards that have Goblin in the name but don't have the creature type Goblin.

card.name: Goblin Mountaineer
card.ability: Mountainwalk
card.flavor: Goblin mountaineer, barely keeps his family fed.

card.name: Goblin Piker
card.flavor: Once he'd worked out which end of the thing was sharp, he was promoted to guard duty.

card.name: Goblin Raider
card.ability: Goblin Raider can't block.
card.flavor:
"I seen lots o' fights. To win ya gotta bash hard and not get bashed back."
—Goblin grunt

card.name: Goblin War Cry
card.ability: Target opponent chooses a creature he or she controls. Other creatures he or she controls can't block this turn.
card.flavor:
"Goblins cry, soldiers fly.
Stones fly, soldiers die"

card.name: Goblin War Strike
card.ability: Goblin War Strike deals damage equal to the number of Goblins you control to target player.

card.name: Golden Bear
card.flavor: The elvish scout was scrupulous about the truth. She told the traders that gold lay nearby.

card.name: Hand of Death
card.ability: Destroy target nonblack creature.
card.flavor: The touch of death is never gentle.

card.name: Harmony of Nature
card.ability: Tap any number of untapped creatures you control. You gain 4 life for each creature tapped this way.

card.name: Hidden Horror
card.ability: When Hidden Horror enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a creature card.
card.ruling:
4/1/2008 : When the ability resolves, you choose whether to sacrifice the creature or perform the other action. If you can’t perform the other action, then you must sacrifice the creature.
4/1/2008 : If the creature is no longer on the battlefield when the ability resolves, you may still perform the action if you want.

card.name: Hurricane
card.ability: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : Whether or not a creature has flying is only checked on resolution.

card.name: Ironhoof Ox
card.ability: Ironhoof Ox can't be blocked by more than one creature.
card.flavor: The good news is it's vegetarian. The bad news is it just doesn't like you.

card.name: Jagged Lightning
card.ability: Jagged Lightning deals 3 damage to each of two target creatures.

card.name: Just Fate
card.ability:
Cast Just Fate only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.
Destroy target attacking creature.

card.name: Kiss of Death
card.ability: Kiss of Death deals 4 damage to target opponent. You gain 4 life.
card.flavor:
"I'd sooner lock lips with a viper. At least I might walk away from that."
—Elvish scout

card.name: Lava Axe
card.ability: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player.
card.flavor: Meant to cut through the body and burn straight to the soul.

card.name: Lone Wolf
card.ability: You may have Lone Wolf assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.
card.ruling:
4/1/2008 : If this creature is attacking a planeswalker, assigning its damage as though it weren't blocked means the damage is assigned to the planeswalker, not to the defending player.
4/1/2008 : When assigning combat damage, you choose whether you want to assign all damage to blocking creatures, or if you want to assign all of it to the defending player or planeswalker. You can't split the damage assignment between them.
4/1/2008 : You can decide to assign damage to the defending player or planeswalker even if the blocking creature has protection from green or damage preventing effects on it.
4/1/2008 : If blocked by a creature with banding, the defending player decides whether or not the damage is assigned "as though it weren't blocked".

card.name: Lurking Nightstalker
card.ability: Whenever Lurking Nightstalker attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
card.flavor: The shadows know.

card.name: Lynx
card.ability: Forestwalk
card.flavor: Rarely seen, hardly heard, never caught.

card.name: Magma Giant
card.ability: When Magma Giant enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.

card.name: Mind Rot
card.ability: Target player discards two cards.

card.name: Moaning Spirit
card.ability: Flying
card.flavor: The dead sing their own lullabies.

card.name: Monstrous Growth
card.ability: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
card.flavor: The nightstalkers' little game of tease-the-squirrel suddenly took an unexpected turn.

card.name: Muck Rats
card.flavor:
"Just as some fool said it couldn't get worse, the rats began to show up."
—Alaborn soldier

card.name: Mystic Denial
card.ability: Counter target creature or sorcery spell.

card.name: Natural Spring
card.ability: Target player gains 8 life.
card.flavor: The dying ask for water because they know it contains life.

card.name: Nature's Lore
card.ability: Search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
card.flavor:
"Every seed planted is another lesson the forest can teach us."
—Arathel, elvish queen
card.ruling:
10/4/2004 : Because the "search" requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don't have to find the card if you don't want to.
8/1/2008 : You can find any card with the land type Forest, including Snow-covered Forest or non-Basic lands like Tropical Island, Murmuring Bosk, or Stomping Ground. You can even find a card that is a land in addition to other types, such as Dryad Arbor.

card.name: Nightstalker Engine
card.ability: Nightstalker Engine's power is equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
card.flavor: Part metal, part bone, and all death.

card.name: Norwood Archers
card.ability: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
card.flavor:
"‘Air superiority?' Not while our archers scan the skies."
—Elvish scout

card.name: Norwood Priestess
card.ability: {T}: You may put a green creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

card.name: Norwood Ranger
card.flavor: Some trees bear deadly fruit.

card.name: Norwood Riders
card.ability: Norwood Riders can't be blocked by more than one creature.
card.flavor: "Trade my moose? Sure—when I find a horse that can spear ten goblins at a time"

card.name: Norwood Warrior
card.ability: Whenever Norwood Warrior becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
card.flavor: "The woods hold peace for those who desire it, but those who seek battle will find me."

card.name: Obsidian Giant
card.flavor: After a while, ships stopped sailing within his reach.

card.name: Ogre Arsonist
card.ability: When Ogre Arsonist enters the battlefield, destroy target land.

card.name: Ogre Berserker
card.ability: Haste
card.flavor: The machine does the growling, so the ogre's free to smile.

card.name: Ogre Taskmaster
card.ability: Ogre Taskmaster can't block.
card.flavor: Three little goblins, enjoying their brew. One bumped an ogre, and then there were two.

card.name: Ogre Warrior
card.flavor: Assault and battery included.

card.name: Path of Peace
card.ability: Destroy target creature. Its owner gains 4 life.
card.flavor:
"You could die famous or you could die old. I chose old."
—Former soldier
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : If the spell fails because the target is not there or isn't legal, the owner does not gain any life.

card.name: Piracy
card.ability: Until end of turn, you may tap lands you don't control for mana. Spend this mana only to cast spells.
card.flavor: The sea gives, and the sea takes. Some just help with the taking.

card.name: Plated Wurm
card.flavor:
"I'd hate to see the bird that could get this wurm"
—Alaborn soldier

card.name: Predatory Nightstalker
card.ability: When Predatory Nightstalker enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent sacrifice a creature.

card.name: Prowling Nightstalker
card.ability: Prowling Nightstalker can't be blocked except by black creatures.
card.flavor: Silent as a serpent, twisted as a lone bog tree, evil as Tojira's heart.

card.name: Raging Goblin
card.ability: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
card.flavor: He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.

card.name: Raiding Nightstalker
card.ability: Swampwalk
card.flavor:
"Our steeds need food, water, stabling. Theirs just need prey."
—Restela, Alaborn marshal

card.name: Rain of Daggers
card.ability: Destroy all creatures target opponent controls. You lose 2 life for each creature destroyed this way.
card.flavor: Knives in the sky, cries in the air, and blood on the ground.

card.name: Raise Dead
card.ability: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
card.flavor:
"Life from death is part of the natural cycle. This is merely a shortcut."
—Tojira, swamp queen
card.ruling:
10/4/2004 : You must show the card you bring out of the graveyard to your opponent.
10/4/2004 : The creature being brought back is chosen on announcement and not on resolution of the spell because it is targeted.
4/1/2008 : A "creature card" is any card with the type Creature, even if it has other types such as Artifact, Enchantment, or Land. Older cards of type Summon are also Creature cards.

card.name: Rally the Troops
card.ability:
Cast Rally the Troops only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.
Untap all creatures you control.

card.name: Ravenous Rats
card.ability: When Ravenous Rats enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.

card.name: Razorclaw Bear
card.ability: Whenever Razorclaw Bear becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
card.flavor:
One razorclaw is three bears too many.
—Elvish saying

card.name: Relentless Assault
card.ability: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.
card.ruling:
10/4/2004 : If you manage to cast this during a main phase of your opponent's turn, that opponent's creatures will untap and that opponent will be able to attack again. It will not allow you to attack during their turn.
10/4/2004 : Abilities that trigger when a creature attacks, blocks, or is blocked will trigger during each combat that turn. Thus, a creature with Rampage will get the bonus added during each attack.
10/4/2004 : A creature that must attack each turn, must only attack once that turn. It is not forced into each attack that turn.
10/4/2004 : It only creates an additional combat and main phase if it resolves during a main phase.

card.name: Remove
card.ability:
Cast Remove only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.
Return target attacking creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Renewing Touch
card.ability: Shuffle any number of target creature cards from your graveyard into your library.
card.flavor: Death just encourages life the more.

card.name: Return of the Nightstalkers
card.ability: Return all Nightstalker permanent cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. Then destroy all Swamps you control.

card.name: Righteous Charge
card.ability: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.
card.flavor:
"Bravery shines brightest in a pure soul."
—Restela, Alaborn marshal
card.ruling: 1/24/2013 : Only creatures you control when Righteous Charge resolves will get +2/+2. Creatures that come under your control later in the turn will not.

card.name: Righteous Fury
card.ability: Destroy all tapped creatures. You gain 2 life for each creature destroyed this way.

card.name: River Bear
card.ability: Islandwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player controls an Island.)
card.flavor: The bears had been isolated on an island for hundreds of years, until the island sank and the bears didn't.

card.name: Salvage
card.ability: Put target card from your graveyard on top of your library.
card.flavor:
"What was taken shall be restored."
—Arathel, elvish queen

card.name: Screeching Drake
card.ability:
Flying
When Screeching Drake enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Sea Drake
card.ability:
Flying
When Sea Drake enters the battlefield, return two target lands you control to their owner's hand.
card.ruling: 10/1/2008 : When the ability resolves, if one of the lands has become an illegal target (because it's no longer on the battlefield, for example), you return the other one to your hand. If both of the lands have become illegal targets, the ability is countered. This has no effect on Sea Drake.

card.name: Sleight of Hand
card.ability: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : If there is only one card in your library, it goes to your hand.

card.name: Spitting Earth
card.ability: Spitting Earth deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.

card.name: Steam Catapult
card.ability: {T}: Destroy target tapped creature. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.
card.flavor: "You idiots Turn it around Turn it around"

card.name: Steam Frigate
card.ability: Steam Frigate can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
card.flavor:
"Is it merchants or is it pirates?"
"It's Talas—there's no difference."

card.name: Stone Rain
card.ability: Destroy target land.
card.flavor: There goes the neighborhood

card.name: Swarm of Rats
card.ability: Swarm of Rats's power is equal to the number of Rats you control.

card.name: Sylvan Basilisk
card.ability: Whenever Sylvan Basilisk becomes blocked by a creature, destroy that creature.

card.name: Sylvan Yeti
card.ability: Sylvan Yeti's power is equal to the number of cards in your hand.
card.flavor: The deeper the wood, the greater its strength.

card.name: Talas Air Ship
card.ability: Flying
card.flavor:
"Their ships pollute our air as they themselves pollute our forest."
—Arathel, elvish queen

card.name: Talas Explorer
card.ability:
Flying
When Talas Explorer enters the battlefield, look at target opponent's hand.

card.name: Talas Merchant
card.flavor: The trader let loose a laugh that made all around him check their purses.

card.name: Talas Researcher
card.ability: {T}: Draw a card. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.
card.flavor:
From time, knowledge.
From knowledge, power.

card.name: Talas Scout
card.ability: Flying
card.flavor:
"Scouting a battle before you fight it is just good business."
—Jefan, Talas ship captain

card.name: Talas Warrior
card.ability: Talas Warrior is unblockable.
card.flavor: The sea is in their blood. Literally.

card.name: Temple Acolyte
card.ability: When Temple Acolyte enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
card.flavor: Young, yes. Inexperienced, yes. Weak? Don't count on it.

card.name: Temple Elder
card.ability: {T}: You gain 1 life. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.
card.flavor:
"Give us breath. Give us life. Prepare us for the day we make."
—The Alaborn "Rite of Battle"

card.name: Temporal Manipulation
card.ability: Take an extra turn after this one.
card.flavor: Doing something at the last minute isn't so bad when you can make that minute last.
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : If multiple "extra turn" effects resolve in the same turn, take them in the reverse of the order that the effects resolved.

card.name: Theft of Dreams
card.ability: Draw a card for each tapped creature target opponent controls.
card.flavor: "First they fight, then they sleep, then they dream. And finally I receive my reward."

card.name: Tidal Surge
card.ability: Tap up to three target creatures without flying.
card.flavor: Four little goblins, trapped by the sea. One teased a serpent, and then there were three.

card.name: Time Ebb
card.ability: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.
card.flavor:
"The ogre had come from out of the blue, so that's where I sent it back."
—Talas wizard

card.name: Touch of Brilliance
card.ability: Draw two cards.
card.flavor: "I don't want what I don't have. I want more of what I do have."

card.name: Town Sentry
card.ability: Whenever Town Sentry blocks, it gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
card.flavor:
"So he gots a sword. Big deal."
"Yeah, it's a big deal—it's a big sword"
—Two goblins outside the gates of Trokin

card.name: Tree Monkey
card.ability: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
card.flavor:
"They serve the world best on a platter with shallots and onions."
—Talas sailor

card.name: Tremor
card.ability: Tremor deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
card.flavor: One little goblin shook up the ground. When the dust cleared, no one was found.

card.name: Trokin High Guard
card.flavor: Battle tempers soldiers as fire tempers steel.

card.name: Undo
card.ability: Return two target creatures to their owners' hands.
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : The two creatures may have different owners and return to their respective owner's hands.

card.name: Untamed Wilds
card.ability: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
card.ruling:
10/4/2004 : Because the "search" requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don't have to find the card if you don't want to.
10/15/2006 : Can fetch a Snow land.

card.name: Vampiric Spirit
card.ability:
Flying
When Vampiric Spirit enters the battlefield, you lose 4 life.

card.name: Vengeance
card.ability: Destroy target tapped creature.
card.flavor: A bullet renders all sizes equal.

card.name: Volcanic Hammer
card.ability: Volcanic Hammer deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
card.flavor: Fire finds its form in the heat of the forge.

card.name: Volunteer Militia
card.flavor: People fight hardest on their own soil.

card.name: Warrior's Stand
card.ability:
Cast Warrior's Stand only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.
Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Wild Griffin
card.ability: Flying
card.flavor: Two little goblins, out in the sun. Down came a griffin, and then there was one.

card.name: Wild Ox
card.ability: Swampwalk
card.flavor: It has the run of the swamps, and it knows it.

card.name: Wildfire
card.ability: Each player sacrifices four lands. Wildfire deals 4 damage to each creature.

card.name: Wind Sail
card.ability: One or two target creatures gain flying until end of turn.
card.flavor: It pays to be at home both on the sea and in the sky.
